full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 MF Fatima Medical Clinic MEDICAL GROUP 820-A South Alvarado Street Los Angeles, CA 90057 Telephone: (213) 384-0604 Fax: (310) 278-8176 March 6.1999. RE : MATUS MARIA ALIEN #: A092360662 DOB : 11-12-14 ANSWER TO QUESTION OF MENTAL DISABILITY OR IMPAIRMENT: Diagnosis of Mental Disability or Impairment: 1. Memory impairment due to A. Dementia of the Alzheimer's type with depressed mood DSM IV 290.21 B. Organic Brain syndrome ICD code 310.1 PHYSICAL DISABILITY OR IMPAIRMENT: 1. Osteoarthritis lower extremities both joints and lumbar since 1989 ICD code 714 2. Constant cephalgia for one year. ICD code 7840 3. Frequent diarrhea for long time ICD code 0090 4. Hypercholesterolemia since 1997 ICD code 2720 5. Moderazte vision loss bilaterally 20/50 ICD code 36902 6. Varicose veins both legs for 15 years ICD code 459.9 7. Osteoporosis, unknown date of onset ICD code 733 8. Moderate hearing loss both ears since 1993 ICD code 389 9. Left and right cataract since 1993 ICD code 366.13 10 Hysterectomy (1995) 11. Dissiness for 3 years. MEDICATION : Ibuprofen 600 mg. bid for osteoarthritis, excedrine extra strenth for pc pain and osteoarthritis, Oscal 500 mg. one bid for osteoporosis, NATURE: Memory Patient has poor memory of recents events. Mrs. Matus is sufffering from memory impairment since 1988. She is also suffering from inability to learn new information, also disturbances in executive functioning such as planning, organizing, sequencing and abstracting. The patient cannot concentrate and overall declined her intellectual ability Patient has symptoms of depression such as sleep disturbances, feeling of loneliness, slowed speech. Patient has been loaa in her neighborhood for several times. ORIGEN: Of memory impairment is dementia of the Alzheimer'type with depressed mood. organic brain syndrome, and multiple chronic illnesses, and taking a variety of medications. EXTENT: Moderate to severe and persistent deterioration of patient's mental impairment since 3 years ago.
